text: Both BFS and DFS can be used to find in O(m + n) - 1. Undirected Graph:- 1. Single connected component or not 2. #0f Connected Components in G 3. Single Bi-Connected Component or not 4. # of Bi-Connected Components in G 2. Directed Graph: - 1. Single weakly connected component or not 2. #Of weakly Connected Components in G 3. Single strongly connected Component o not 4. # Of strongly connected Components
